description:
Natsu is heading back with Wendy, who holds the key to saving Erza, while Gray is facing off against one of the cornerstones of Oracion Seis, Racer! But things go beyond just his overwhelming speed, and heat up into an all-out magic motorcycle race, the Dead Grand Prix! Gray`s got guts taking on the enemy on his own turf, but then his old fellow pupil Lyon shows up. With the two them working in sync, can they find a way to steal his speed?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le grand prix de la mort
